title: Microsurgical replantation

description: Focuses on microsurgery and the successful "replantation" of fingers and toes with full use and feelings. This program also explains the problems associated with finding the necessary parts (including veins) that are needed for a successful operation. Finally emphasis is made on the need for continued research in the area of microsurgery. Contains some graphic images.
